特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: In this class, you will practice how to put your thoughts into a logical order and to be able to write a paragraph accurately (grammatically correct) and fluently (speedy). In particular, the following points will be focused in this course: 1) understanding what a good paragraph looks like, 2) writing a well-organized and developed paragraph, 3) improving fluency of your writing. You will also do a mini-presentation based on the topic you choose.
授業方法:
The class is conducted in a face to face format including simultaneous and two-way sessions. In this course, students will read the textbook and do the assignments on LUNA after hearing the lecture or watching the lecture video and submit the assignment by the deadline. You will follow the process (several steps) to complete each paragraph. By doing the assignments uploaded on LUNA, you will complete each step and finally complete three paragraphs. You also write a journal 6 times. Take an in-class timed writing test and final quiz. You will do both individual and group works to complete three paragraphs.
＊For questions, you can use KG Email or LUNA, and the zoom link will be provided on LUNA.
